sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Courses() { const [courses, setCourses] = useState([]); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Sample courses with image URLs const sampleCourses = [ { id: 1, title: "React for Beginners", code: "RfB", description: "Learn React.js from scratch. Build modern web applications with reusable components.", category: "Web Development", level: "Beginner", duration: "6 weeks", rating: 4.7, students: 120, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1633356122544-f134324a6cee?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "React.js code on screen" }, { id: 2, title: "Introduction to Data Science", code: "ItDS", description: "Master data analysis, visualization, and machine learning fundamentals.", category: "Data Science", level: "Intermediate", duration: "8 weeks", rating: 4.8, students: 85, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #f093fb 0%, #f5576c 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1551288049-bebda4e38f71?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Data science visualization" }, { id: 3, title: "AI Fundamentals", code: "AF", description: "Understand artificial intelligence, machine learning, and neural networks.", category: "AI/ML", level: "Intermediate", duration: "10 weeks", rating: 4.6, students: 65, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #4facfe 0%, #00f2fe 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1485827404703-89b55fcc595e?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Artificial intelligence concept" }, { id: 4, title: "Python Programming", code: "PP", description: "Learn Python from basics to advanced concepts. Perfect for beginners.", category: "Programming", level: "Beginner", duration: "7 weeks", rating: 4.5, students: 150, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #43e97b 0%, #38f9d7 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1526379094608-8c18d3f4d2a9?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Python programming code" }, { id: 5, title: "Web Development Fundamentals", code: "WDF", description: "HTML, CSS, and JavaScript essentials for building modern websites.", category: "Web Development", level: "Beginner", duration: "6 weeks", rating: 4.7, students: 95, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #fa709a 0%, #fee140 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1547658719-da2b51169166?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Web development tools" }, { id: 6, title: "Machine Learning", code: "ML", description: "Advanced machine learning algorithms and deep learning techniques.", category: "AI/ML", level: "Advanced", duration: "12 weeks", rating: 4.9, students: 45, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #30cfd0 0%, #330867 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555255707-c07966088b7b?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Machine learning algorithms" }, { id: 7, title: "JavaScript Mastery", code: "JS", description: "Deep dive into modern JavaScript, ES6+ features, and advanced patterns.", category: "Web Development", level: "Intermediate", duration: "8 weeks", rating: 4.6, students: 110, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #ffecd2 0%, #fcb69f 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1627398242454-45a1465c2479?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "JavaScript code" }, { id: 8, title: "Full Stack Development", code: "FSD", description: "Build complete applications with React, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.", category: "Web Development", level: "Advanced", duration: "14 weeks", rating: 4.8, students: 75, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #a8edea 0%, #fed6e3 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555066931-4365d14bab8c?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "Full stack development" }, { id: 9, title: "UI/UX Design Principles", code: "UX", description: "Learn user interface and user experience design fundamentals.", category: "Design", level: "Beginner", duration: "5 weeks", rating: 4.7, students: 88, color: "linear-gradient(135deg, #d299c2 0%, #fef9d7 100%)", imageUrl: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1561070791-2526d30994b5?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80", imageAlt: "UI/UX design" } ]; useEffect(() => { // Simulate API call setTimeout(() => { setCourses(sampleCourses); setLoading(false); }, 500); }, []); if (loading) { return (
Loading courses...

Loading courses...

); } // Function to handle image error - fallback to gradient const handleImageError = (e, course) => { e.target.style.display = 'none'; e.target.parentElement.style.background = course.color; e.target.parentElement.innerHTML = `
${course.code}
`; }; return (
{/* Header */}

Available Courses

Explore our AI-powered courses designed for all skill levels

Try AI Features
{/* Course Filters */}
Filter Courses
{/* Course Grid */}

Featured Courses ({courses.length})

{courses.map((course) => (
{/* Course Image with Overlay */}
handleImageError(e, course)} loading="lazy" /> {/* Course Code Badge Overlay */}
{course.code}
{/* Category Badge Overlay */}
{course.category}
{course.title}
{course.rating}

{course.description}

{course.level} {course.duration}
{course.students}
Includes Projects
Next start: Soon Certificate
))}
{/* Course Stats */}

{courses.length}

Total Courses

{courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.students, 0).toLocaleString()}

Total Students

{Math.round(courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.rating, 0) / courses.length * 10) / 10}

Avg Rating

{[...new Set(courses.map(c => c.category))].length}

Categories

{/* Categories Breakdown */}
Course Categories
{[...new Set(courses.map(c => c.category))].map((category, index) => { const categoryCourses = courses.filter(c => c.category === category); const percentage = Math.round((categoryCourses.length / courses.length) * 100); return (
{category}
{categoryCourses.length} course{categoryCourses.length !== 1 ? 's' : ''} {percentage}%
); })}
{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Start Learning?

Join thousands of students who have transformed their careers with our AI-powered courses.

Explore AI Features
30-day money-back guarantee Certificate included 24/7 support
); } export default Courses;
